item.title: Moving large scale consumer e-commerce Infrastructure to Mesh
item.description: In this session we will cover Previous Setup: High level overview of setup focussing on external and inter-service/component communication where we mainly used Nginx, HAProxy and Envoyproxy. Challenges and Improvements: Briefly cover the challenges and improvements which essentially was translated into set of requirements Istio Onboarding and Integration: How Istio covered our requirements and steps we took and tools we built/used to on-board micro-services and manage the mesh setup. We will also cover the challenges involved in migrating, solutions derived and learnings gained.
